title: Statement by the President on the Tornado in Missouri and the Severe Storms Across the Midwest | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 23, 2011

 



Statement by the President on the Tornado in Missouri and the Severe Storms Across the Midwest





	Michelle and I send our deepest condolences to the families of all those who lost their lives in the tornadoes and severe weather that struck Joplin, Missouri as well as communities across the Midwest today.Â  We commend the heroic efforts by those who have responded and who are working to help their friends and neighbors at this very difficult time. At my direction, FEMA is working with the affected areas' state and local officials to support response and recovery efforts, and the federal government stands ready to help our fellow Americans as needed.
